message.body: I'm just saying this to remind myself but we have to send Charmaine's ID back but send her a pic of it first
K so I left my keys in the room. Are you home?
Yeppp
I'll leave it unlocked!
Thanks! grace is coming by to pick up wine glasses for our film. Do we have a bottle of wine we can use as a prop and not drink?
The wine we have is haleys
Word I ask her
Grace is here did you talk to Haley
I texted her she hasn't answered
Just leave it we don't need it
Sorry
I'm sorry I'm at a class thing til 4
When are you gonna be home homie don't make any rash decisions
I love and miss you
cHLOe the boY texted Me and I'm sooooo ducking sleep deprived I don't even know what to do
Where have you been all my life
Also I'm PISSED about the starbucks someone left on my desk and a piece of camera equipment. U suq
You're not gonna be home again?!?! Omg are you alive? And I'm joking about the starbucks dude
Chloe I miss you so much!!!!
Idkk whut I wanna do even
Oh yeah I'm alive. I slept on a flight of stairs for 3 hours and then napped in the editing room for an hour. So solid. But I'm going to literally be a crazy person if I try to see him tomorrow
Then just be like "I've been working on this really cool film project all weekend but am running on 3 hours of sleep, is there any other day you'll be around when I won't be so crazy"
Lolololol not saying that
I mean something along those lines hahahah
